Title: Episode 5
Plot:
Dr. Statham enters politics but requires a voice coach and the use of a car with two loudhailers!
Martin inadvertently becomes a pimp.
Mac and Caroline get a little closer but Holly sticks her oar in with a little ginger surprise for Mac.
Harriet and Lyndon manage to have a date despite Joanna's best attempts to sidetrack her with work.
Guy is not exactly the best flatmate but is he there at the right time for Caroline?
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, sexual material and other content that may offend
Writer: Fay Rusling, Gary Howe, James Henry, Oriane Messina
GuestStars: Paterson Joseph, Darren Boyd, Geoff Francis, Jennifer Hennessy, Rosie Cavaliero, Tom Goodman-Hill, Sally Phillips, Dylan Woodstock
